website_summaries.verdict: This fast-paced twist on the original gets players off their feet as they try to toss and land four ping pong balls in a row.
pros: A fun new version that makes this game more active, and introduces an element of chance
Bounce the balls into the slots to get 4 balls in a row
Easy to clean up when you're done playing
cons: There are better game choices for younger children
The design may not support the backboard well over time

customer_reviews.title: Fun twist on a childhood favorite, but lacking one key accessory.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great take on Connect 4. I have a lot of fun with my son playing this. However, it needs an accessory where players can keep their balls during play, instead of just having all the balls loose. Other than that, this is great for all you beer pong or quarters players, as well as for the kiddies. Fun times!
customer_reviews.author: Spewbaca

customer_reviews.title: Reviews convinced me to buy it
customer_reviews.text: So I wasn’t going to buy it because I thought it was just a way to make a familiar game different and make the company more money. Plus I hate chasing balls. But the reviews convinced me and my 11 yr old, 8 yr old, 5 yr old and Daddy played it last night and they loved it. Which says a lot because we are a GAME PLAY FAMILY. Of course one ball Is already lost! Grr. Anywa, they said it’s very fun and easy to play and glad we got it. With the age range of the three kids playing and the Dad making his own thumbs up comment I think it’s a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Debra RishmawiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: This game rocks!
customer_reviews.text: If Connect 4 and Beer Pong had a baby, it would be Connect 4 Shots. This game is fun for all ages because it is challenging for kids but adults can put their own spin on it too. The packaging is great, easy to take along anywhere. Thank you for not subjecting us to a box with all of these balls. Made a great gift for part of my son's 9th birthday!
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: We love regular connect 4, so it was only logical to get this game too! The idea of the game is easy to understand and learn...but the backboard portion of the game doesn't hold up in position after using a dozen times. The design of the backboard is to catch the balls and have them roll into the slots, but the weight of the backboard (along with the balls) seems too much for it and it ultimately falls down. I wish that was designed differently, but otherwise its a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Fun for adults
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game for adults, but I wish they sold extra balls. My dog chewed apart a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great new twist on a classic game and it is a ton of fun for the entire family! Make sure you have a bowl to keep the balls in while playing otherwise they roll all over the place. My only concern is the latch on the bottom that releases the balls will wear and break over time. However, it is easy enough to just turn the game over and dump the balls out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this - fun game
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. I’ve got teenage kids and they are having a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Jason King

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game. Thank goodness i have carpet otherwise these balls would be lost in a heart beat. dont play outside lol. the instructions say you both play at the same time, but my son (7 years old) and i find it less chaotic and more fun if we take turns to bounce the ball. because my hands are bigger than his, so i could hold more than he can... making me always the winner because im faster at it... so we opted for taking turns bouncing the ball. works great for us. make sure your game board is against a wall or something.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE

customer_reviews.title: FUN for ALL
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I played this game every night during the pandemic shut down in NC. Balls were bouncing all over the kitchen (our aim is not the best....hahaha) but it is SO much fun. Perfect game for all ages. We're 62 and 65 and we're hooked and the grandkids loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Al Bonsall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome new take on a family favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little game that presents a new challenge to a family favorite! My kids love it and play it all the time! It's a really fun way to play with your friends and family that can be a little different. It sets up easily and one thing that has been really thought out is the overall design for storage. It folds away neatly and keeps all the balls in it so you will not lose them. This 'self contained' storage is a master stroke and kudos to the designers! Definitely something I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Smithmeister

customer_reviews.title: Beer Pong Jr.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like this game should be called "Beer Pong for Kids". But I'm an adult and we had a blast playing it, and yes, as a drinking game. Mark my words some college kid is gonna reinvent this game somehow and start a league. Forthe kids it is also a fun way to even the playing field. You see it's not just strategy anymore, it also takes skill. Jocks and nerds can now battle like equals.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Can you ever have enough games during this pandemic?
customer_reviews.text: After having the, "no more daily Amazon deliveries" talk with my husband, I saw a TikTok of a couple playing this and just had to break our little "agreement." =] He ended up loving it too! Sorry for the blurry pic, I took a screenshot from a TikTok I made but it's seriously so fun. We played where each of us get a turn and we also played rapid fire of whoever gets 4 in a row first. Don't tell him I'm telling the internet, but I AM THE CHAMPION! Seriously a fun game and we're in our 30s. Would highly recommend for any age!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for adults and kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband actually! I think he thought it was going to be too much for children & not adults. We have both LOVED it! It's really a lot of fun. We always put the board against a wall for additional support. Only annoyance can be balls going everywhere, but kids like to make a game of chasing the balls. Wish it came with a few extra balls because I know some are going to go missing. Balls may be same size as ping pong balls?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH TOY!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my pre-k class loves this. Even the teachers. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Giggles in a box
customer_reviews.text: This is fun for 2 or for teams. Chaos, pandemonium, gleeful squeals of competitive nature all ensue with this game. It's fun to play and just as fun to watch others compete for the winning bounce. Had a bit of trouble getting the ledge set right and ir does slip occasionally, but it doesn't stop the fun. Bonus everything stores within the game so there is no need for a storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Preparing kids for beer pong!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun. I think the adults have more fun than the kids! We bought this game at the beginning of the pandemic. It ended up being a hit and killed lots of time. The whole family loved it. I see this still being used and not collecting dust even after we get things back to normal. I recommend this game for sure. Note: This can also be turned into a drinking game for the adults. lol
customer_reviews.author: chavezy09

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my neice and got one for my daughter. They, and their families, love this game. It does help to have a little skill but it is better to have a lot of luck! It is fun for all ages. Will certainly purchase again for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie LeMonds

customer_reviews.title: Fun game and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We're all adults in my family, yet we had a riot playing teams and playing the winning player of last round type thing (2-player game). It was lively, and the balls are like ping pong balls! Very bouncy. The package was shipped and arrived quickly! Thanks to the seller for quick service! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. James

customer_reviews.title: Fun for grownups and kids! :)
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a Christmas present for my son, but my husband opened the package and left it in view lol.. so we decided to open it and play it.. and let me tell you, IT WAS A HIT! fun for the kids and adults (to the point that the adults wouldn't give the kids a turn at one point lol)
customer_reviews.author: Yeni

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I knew the product was gently used and almost new, it also had been inspected by Amazon to resell. However when I tried to put it together the game wouldn't stand up on it's legs, I had to hammer it in to get it to go in properly. After spending 20 minutes on it, it still wasn't level and wouldn't stay up without support. Not sure if it's a defect in the product or just that it was used. After doing some research online I didn't find others having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cubmasterdee

customer_reviews.title: Fun new twist on Connect 4!
customer_reviews.text: A fun new take on Connect 4. Took a second to figure out how to set it up. Self contained and portable which is nice. Standard size ping pong balls which are easy and inexpensive to replace if lost. -1 star because there’s no way to manage the loose balls easily on a hard surface. Have to use bowls or something. Also one of the red balls is orange. Not a big deal unless you’re ADD like me. :)
customer_reviews.author: DaveO

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was watching TV in my bedroom last week when I had strep. I heard my 12yo son and 52yo husband laughing and yelling, having the best time. I got out of bed to see what they were doing, and I learned they were playing this. Fun, challenging. There’s some skill and strategy involved, but even if you haven’t mastered those, it’s still very fun, and you can even win.
customer_reviews.author: AngTho

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this as a part of buy 2 games get one free event on Amazon. I thought it would be stupid, but two adults played with this for over an hour. It is so fun to play~~ wish it had a better back board though. You have to play this against the wall or you'll be fetching balls all night.
customer_reviews.author: hyelin

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for the entire family!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game! Everyone has enjoyed it. It’s a little tricky for the little ones but they still have so much fun. I love that the case serves as a storage system so no need to keep the box around. Once it is assembled, it’s good to go each time. The back board can be a little tricky and you might think it’s not at a good angle, but it works just fine. So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: this game is so fun! it’s great for many age levels... i purchased it to play against my hubby (we are both in our 30’s) and we have had a ton of fun playing each night! it could be just as fun at a kids party or an adult one- can be a little loud with the ball bouncing on the table, as it’s harder than a ping pong ball. but would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fun twist on a classic game
customer_reviews.text: We always make sure to get our children a game we can all play together on Christmas and this year we picked this one for my son. We've played it so many times each day I can safely say it's his new favorite game. It's challenging for all ages yet simple and a lot of fun. We can even break up into teams or just play with 2 people. Definitely a fun twist on a classic game and I highly recommend this for game lovers, kids, and families.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMel

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, has its downsides
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and stores well. Fun game overall, but the balls really go everywhere. Spend a lot of time chasing after the balls instead if actually playing the game. Best to set up against a wall and stress to those playing that they don't need to bounce the balls hard.
customer_reviews.author: A2MomTo3

customer_reviews.title: Hard to play
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for a 10 year old as this is the game she wanted. It is very hard to bounce the ball into the slots on top of the game. The balls end up going in all directions. Hard to play for younger kids
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & fun game!  Many ways of playing!
customer_reviews.text: It's such a fun game! It's for everyone, children and grownups! Nice thoughtful design. Easy to carry for traveling, but does take space. The only drawback for this toy is there is no room to store balls while playing. I have to get a bucket to store balls. Still, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mom_of_2

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun (Even For Adults)
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a fun family gift. My dad and adult brother absolutely loved it. They played this for nearly a week before we lost some of the balls. It’s easy to store and you can honestly find other kinds of balls to use if need be. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kryss

customer_reviews.title: A fun addition to game night
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game for family game night. It's beer pong-y enough that my husband gets a kick out of it and my 10 year old really gets into the game. The plastic is really cheap, one of the legs broke and they slide off easily though. Keep the pieces in a Ziploc because they go missing quick!
customer_reviews.author: Mikki Rae

customer_reviews.title: Fun twist to classic game
customer_reviews.text: Fun, inexpensive game for most ages. If they can bounce a ping pong ball in the general direction they want to then they can play this game. Need hard surface to bounce ball (think hardwood or tile floor, or coffee table).
customer_reviews.author: Daddy-do-right

customer_reviews.title: Good game for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons loved this game and we had to immediately put together. Very easy to follow instructions and all parts were included. You will be chasing some balls that don't bounce in but just part of the game. Good game for kids and adults. Different version of original Connect 4 but great addition to game collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My family loved this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an 8 year old and he loves it. He was able to put it together himself and got a kick out of the balls bouncing all over the place. I do wish it had come with a few extra balls instead of only enough to fill the board, but we can probably replace them with painted ping pong balls later if we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: New twist is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. He is a big love of the original Connect 4 game so I can't wait to see how much he enjoys this new twist. I love the idea and it seems like it will be fun. Arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey C

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun for toddler
customer_reviews.text: We actually gave this to our son (29 years old) instead of to our grandson (3 years old) because of the age suggested age on the game. Our grandson soon learned how to bounce the balls so they would go into the slots and he loved it. We played this game every day while visiting them, several times each day. Best gift this year!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ham

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My family and I play this game about once a week and we have had it for a about a month. We make up new rules and try trick shots. For kids and young teens this is a lot of fun. Even my older nieces and nephews play for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Silice

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing you could buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I saw this game on tiktok and I got it and it is actually the best game I’ve ever played. You absolutely need it, no for real please buy it it’s so fun u have no idea. IM OBSESSEDDDDD. You need this game more than you need air. K thanks buy it
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids 12&10 loved this game it’s super fun and they had fun getting the adults to play. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is the backdrop. It’s a bit flimsy and it would be better if it curled around the edges
customer_reviews.author: ASully

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile for the younger kids to get their bounces right but this quickly became a favorite game for them. You just have to keep on them about picking up all the scattered balls afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a family must have!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves the game! Part of the game got slightly bent about two weeks in and so our backboard leans a bit. But we are still able to play and enjoy it. Just maybe be careful when adjusting the plastic backboard piece and putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: Confombled05

customer_reviews.title: Family Adult game night
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my adult children. They use them for different reasons. They are a blast to play. We essentially play them every time we go camping and when we are stuck inside all winter. Family game night, new twist.
customer_reviews.author: Kozette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: First off 9 year old 12 year old and 17 year old love it! Great adult drinking game as well! It holds everything in the game so no need for a box! Love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun twist on Connect Four and keeps my toddler entertained, along with Mommy and Daddy, for hours! We love racing to see who can bounce their balls fastest to Connect Four.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids 11 and 5 LOVE THIS GAME! We did a smash balls on accident and they don’t have a replacement ball option yet. We just us ping pong balls now. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cate B.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun, but...
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game, but we have to clear the whole dining room to play it bc the balls bounce all over and you need room to run after them. Good exercise, but only a good game for the active and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Nice game but cheaply built.
customer_reviews.text: Nice game but very cheaply made. One of the feet was too large to fit into the hole. We had to squeeze it and use a hammer. The back board is cheap cardboard and I ONE third color ball 🤷🏾‍♀️.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPorter

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my 8 yr old grandson came to visit and we played with it for hours... had to order another one and send it to him when he went back home to play with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good game
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool and different game! Connect four is a fun classic, and this game takes a spin on it. This game used to only require thinking about where to put the dot, but now you have to try and shoot it in there. The little one, 7, loves to play this game, and I don’t mind it either!
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: Connect 4 Pong.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. My 10 year old son and I play it quite a bit. Even though it reminds me of a “beer pong in training.” A fun twist on the original connect 4!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Odell

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to play
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy some games for the kids since the pandemic so that they had fun things to do in the house. They absolutely love this game. They play it all day. Just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: FUN and active game
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun just be prepared to search all over moving furniture around to find the balls if you have time or wood floors. Great way to keep the kids occupied for the holidays or family get togethers
customer_reviews.author: Desp4it

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun!! It’s puts a new spin on an old classic and changes it up enough that it’s a completely different game for all ages. The grandparents enjoyed it as well as the kids, Hub and I. We played two ways- taking turns and a free for all - for whomever can get theirs lined up first!!! Lots of laughs!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Kids were bored with it
customer_reviews.text: Kids got bored with it after a while. Wish it was easier to assemble and just fold and go. But have to do some adjustments to it. Regular Connect4 is much better. Thought this game would be more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mung Star

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Christmas gift for our grandsons. Trying to find games the 3 year old and 10 year old will both be interested in. I'm excited to see if it will.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: This game ended up being different from what I originally thought I was buying, but it was for the better. This game is so fun and can be played by all ages! We bring it to all family gatherings now
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! We love this game a lot. It's so much fun to play. It gives you a work out too chasing after the balls. I highly recommend it for family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: my kids (ages 3,5,7) played it only once and have ignored it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kirton

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: This was a solid product, and was a great addition to our Christmas gifts this year. Everyone in our home (ages 4 to 70) enjoyed playing this. The product was sturdy and fun to play. A must have for every family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun. Way more fun than the original game. It’s fun for kids and adults both and can be a very fun adult drinking game. We were surprised how much we loved this game!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. She loves it & plays it all the time. Her mom told me it’s a great family game & everyone really enjoys playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun new twist on the game
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game to play and it gives us all a chance sgainst my daughter who always wins at connect four, makes her work a little harder for it. Such a fun game to play
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old son absolutley loves this game! He put it together himself and immediately started playing. Had everyone in the family playing from age 5-60+.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Havens

customer_reviews.title: Fun for our entire family (ages 5-40)
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for our family. Ages 5-40. It’s hard to find a game that my youngest can play and this is a winner. Makes a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: yamomndem

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Not yet opened, but looks like it will do the job; specifically requested
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and active game! We just play wild style, first one with four in a row, rapid shooting style instead of taking turns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: balls are everywhere
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun game for kids but they end up throwing the balls at each other. dog also took off with one. now the game is incomplete without the entire set and there is no way to buy more balls.
customer_reviews.author: evaluation

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun product. Doesn’t really bounce on tables as easily as soon in picture however it was fun playing this game with the family
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beer Pong? not for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really a dumb way to change connect 4 game. Bought this for my grandson. It looks more like a precursor to teach college students how to play beer pong.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: My family and I had this game with us on vacation and we had a blast. It's great for young and older family members. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: YVONNE

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and Super fast shipping! Thank you very much for the quick delivery! This is a very fun and different type of game to play with the family. Good game to add to your collection... Especially during quarantine!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This game is super fun! My 7 year old and I play this all the time. I recommend this for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Becky H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun update to a Classic Game.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 boys ages 12,10&6 not to mention their parents as well all love this game. It’s a blast and easy game to play. Highly recommend for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Tough game
customer_reviews.text: Fun but not very easy. Bought it for the kids but it’s too hard more of an adult game. The balls are so bouncy you need a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: beckie carlson

customer_reviews.title: Like connect 4 meets beer pong
customer_reviews.text: Great game. A little chaotic, but there’s no preventing that. You just have to play in an area where the little balls won’t roll away too far! My kids will be alarmingly adept at beer pong when they reach high school.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Still prefer the original
customer_reviews.text: Balls fly all over the place. Ended up putting a blanket on table to catch them so I wasn't chasing them all over the floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: My son who is six loves this game. So far we have only lost one ball, so we are doing good. My husband who is not a lover of games that are not COD, likes this one too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessila

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love playing this game together! Its a fun-fast paced game that can be fun even for adults. The balls are durable and bounce easily. Set-up is easy!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun game. Especially for those of us who enjoy quick, but fun games! Some feel like they'll never end! This is fast paced and fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old...he has showed little interest but my husband and I have a blast playing it! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the right space
customer_reviews.text: Fun for all ages! Definitely provided some good laughs and friendly competition at our Christmas gathering. The only downfall is you need to make sure you have decent space to play in. The rules state both players shoot the balls at the same time. This ended up creating a chaotic atmosphere where the balls bounced all over the room with the players racing to gather them. Everyone enjoyed themselves while playing though!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Just Meh
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this looked fun, but the balls go EVERYWHERE if you have hard wood floors. I have to make sure they keep up with the balls and that none get lost under the TV stand or sofa. Otherwise the game would be pointless eventually. Overall, it is an okay game to add to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. My kids absolutely love it and we crack up. I wouldve given it 5stars, but after 2 days some balls are cracking. It definitely is a blast and gets lots of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Version
customer_reviews.text: I've had a game day and the people/kids absolutely loved it. A great upgrade from the original
customer_reviews.author: Unique82

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 7 1/2 and 9 year old grandsons. They had no trouble mastering the concept and are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: Fun exciting game
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun!!!! We play as a family and every time it gets more fun and more fun! It’s a must buy and a go to for family game nights!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my seven year old nephew. He loves it. Its challenging and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Eponine16

customer_reviews.title: Fun take on an old classic
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old and I always play connect 4, and this is fun take on the old classic game. This is definitely a new favorite! We love this game! The balls are plastic so you need a bouncible surface, and they roll everywhere, but it kind of adds to the fun. Cheaper on here than in store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A FAVORITE AT OUR HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: One of our favorite games to play as a family. We have as much fun as the kids do. Good for anyone age 5 and up
customer_reviews.author: hartr0

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift and everyone loved it. This is fun for all ages and very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lopez

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got to this for our granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it! In fact, the whole family has fun - from 4 years to 52 years old! A great way to have family bonding time and we didn’t stop laughing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun. Nice twist to a classic game. Can't keep up with all the balls rolling everywhere but that's our issue
customer_reviews.author: FELICIA RAY

customer_reviews.title: Great for active kids!
customer_reviews.text: Fun, fun game! A great way to give a kick of energy to your kids! Great for active kids!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play, however ball bounces off really easily and we already lost a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old daughter and it was such a fun game. Easy to put together and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: this game is a lot of fun... it reminds you of the game that is at dave and busters... pretty sure this will make a fun drinking game...lol

customer_reviews.title: Fun Twist on Origional
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my sons 9th birthday and he really enjoyed it and said it was so much better then the original game.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for us all
customer_reviews.text: My family really enjoyed this game! Ages 6, 9 and us parents.

customer_reviews.title: Great game for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play. My grandson is too young to know how to play the game, but still enjoyed bouncing the balls into the game board. Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun & easy to play!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!!! A great twist on the traditional Connect 4. Simple & fun to play as a family!
customer_reviews.author: GG

product_meta.title: Connect 4 Shots Game
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingBounce 'em in for the win! The Connect 4 Shots game is fast-paced, rapid-fire fun in a race to get 4 shots in a row! Count down to start: 1-2-3…bounce! Two players bounce the lightweight, colorful balls into the grid at the same time. Remember, the balls must hit the table before going in. Keep bouncing balls until a player gets 4 in a row of their color for the win. Then when the game is over, fold the grid into a handy storage case. Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: A rapid-fire, bouncin' twist on the Connect 4 game
Players simultaneously bounce balls into the grid
Get 4 in a row of the same color to win
Includes collapsible grid, 2 feet, cardboard backboard, 12 yellow balls, 12 red balls, orange ball, and instructions. Ages 8 and up. For 2 or more players.
